title: Flexible Monthly Payments with Flex Rent, Patio/Balcony, Microwave
posting_body: ['3202 South Mason Avenue, Tacoma, WA 98409', "The Lodge At Madrona offers the lifestyle you've\xa0been looking for.", "We're conveniently located minutes from downtown Tacoma and a short drive from beautiful Gig Harbor.", 'With fantastic shopping, restaurants, and entertainment options down the street with\xa0close proximity to I-5 and Hwy 16, everything you need is easily accessible.', 'Apartment Features:', 'Microwave', 'Large Walk-In Closets', 'Washer/Dryer', 'Cable TV', 'Patio/Balcony', 'Dishwasher', 'Community Features:', 'Zero Deposit Community', 'Translation Service Available', 'Fitness Center', 'Flexible Monthly Payments with Flex Rent', 'Easy Commute to JBLM', '4-Acre Off-Leash Pet Park', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!']
